thread.title: David Bowie’s No Plan EP Set for Special Vinyl Release
thread.title_full: David Bowie’s No Plan EP Set for Special Vinyl Release

author: Jazz Monroe
title: David Bowie’s No Plan EP Set for Special Vinyl Release
text:
David Bowie’s No Plan EP Set for Special Vinyl Release Featuring new art by longtime Bowie collaborator Jonathan Barnbrook David Bowie Photo by George Pimentel/WireImage 
David Bowie ’s No Plan EP will be released on CD on February 24, with special vinyl editions to follow later in the year. After the release of the standard version, on April 21, a limited-edition, dye-cut, white vinyl version will come out May 26, with an accompanying lithograph. Both feature a laser etching on side B, with artwork designed by longtime Bowie collaborator Jonathan Barnbrook. No Plan comprises Blackstar track “Lazarus” and three songs from the album’s sessions, his final recordings. It was digitally released as a standalone EP last month, following the tracks’ inclusion on the Lazarus cast album last October.
